attributes.additional_details: Cutting over seas aid and locking down our boarders to asylum seekers who demand, and are given, hand outs by the government and paid for by us, the tax payer are costing this great nation billions of pounds every year.  How about cutting foreign aid and temporarily closing the boarders to those who have no jobs and only scrounge from us.  We, as a nation have a large deficit and it’s due to this, close the boards, cut foreign aid and we’ll be back in the black in no time.
